summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在 Web 服务器应用程序中处理 ASP.NET 用户配置文件的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that are used to work with ASP.NET user profiles in Web server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源，如数据库中的用户设置。ASP.NET profiles are used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 通过使用配置文件提供程序管理配置文件信息和属性值。Profile information and property values are managed by using a profile provider. 可以通过 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中存储的个人资料信息类，或通过使用实现自定义数据源中抽象类。Profile information can be stored in a Microsoft SQL Server database by using the class, or in a custom data source by using an implementation of the abstract class. 通过使用配置 ASP.NET 配置文件[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置节。ASP.NET profiles are configured by using the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. ASP.NET 时已启用配置文件应用程序启动，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application starts that has profiles enabled, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 强类型化访问器添加到`ProfileCommon`中定义的每个属性的类[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置节。Strongly typed accessors are added to the `ProfileCommon` class for each property that is defined in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section. 实例`ProfileCommon`类设置的值为属性与当前对象。An instance of the `ProfileCommon` class is set as the value of the property of the current object. 可以创建自定义配置文件实现从继承抽象类，以及定义属性中未指定的用户配置文件[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。You can create a custom profile implementation that inherits from the abstract class and that defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element.
